右巻き: (みぎまき) - (ant: 左巻き・1) clockwise
右往左往: (uousaou) - movendo-se confusamente, indo para todo lado, indo para cá e para lá
右手: (migite) - mão direita; lado direito, direção à direita, (à) direita
右手の法則: (みぎてのほうそく) - (Fleming's) right-hand rule
右手座標系: (みぎてざひょうけい) - right-handed coordinate system
右払い: (みぎはらい) - in calligraphy, a triangular stroke going from upper left to lower right
右折: (うせつ) - turning to the right; right turn
右折禁止: (うせつきんし) - No Right Turn!
右文: (ゆうぶん) - respect for literary culture
右方: (うほう) - right side; style of Japanese court music
右方高麗楽: (うほうこまがく) - old Japanese court music from the Nara period
右書き: (みぎがき) - writing from right to left
右端: (みぎはし) - right end; right edge
右翼: (uyoku) - right-wing (politics); extreme right-wing group , right-wing (politics); extreme right-wing group; right wing (pássaro, avião, etc.); right field, right flank, right wing
右肩上がり: (みぎかたあがり) - growing (graph rising to the right); expanding; soaring
右肩下がり: (みぎかたさがり) - decreasing (graph falling to the right); shrinking; declining
右脇: (みぎわき) - right armpit; right side
右腕: (migiude) - braço direito; braço direito, mão direita, pessoa de confiança; braço direito; braço direito, mão direita, pessoa de confiança; arremessador destro
右螺子の法則: (みぎねじのほうそく) - corkscrew rule
右記: (うき) - (primarily used in vertical writing) aforementioned (statement); preceding; at right
右証拠として: (みぎしょうことして) - in witness whereof ...
右詰め: (みぎづめ) - right justification; aligning to the right
右足: (みぎあし) - right foot; right leg
右辺: (うへん) - right side (of an equation, expression, etc.); RHS
右近の橘: (うこんのたちばな) - tachibana tree west of the southern stairs of the Hall for State Ceremonies (in Heian Palace)
右隣: (みぎどなり) - neighbour to the right
右顧左眄: (うこさべん) - (yoji) looking to the right and left; hesitation
叶う: (かなう) - (esp. 叶う) to come true (wish); to be suited; (esp. 敵う) to match (implies competition)/to rival/to bear (e.g. I can't bear the heat)
叶える: (かなえる) - (esp. 叶える) to grant (request, wish)/to answer (prayer); (esp. 適える) to fulfill (conditions)/to meet (requirements)
叶わぬ時の神頼み: (かなわぬときのかみだのみ) - Man turns to God only in his trouble
号: (gou) - número, número, edição, marca, modelo, edição, parte desse grupo; apelido, pseudônimo; sufixo anexado a nomes de navios, trens, aviões, etc.
号する: (ごうする) - to name/to take a second name or alias; to announce/to boast/to declare
号令一下: (ごうれいいっか) - handed-down order; issued instruction; word of command
号口: (ごうぐち) - regular production; present model
号室: (ごうしつ) - suffix for room numbers
号数: (ごうすう) - number or size of periodicals or pictures; type size
号泣: (ごうきゅう) - crying aloud; lamentation; wailing
号車: (ごうしゃ) - classifier for naming train cars
号音: (ごうおん) - signal (sound); starting gun signal
司どる: (つかさどる) - to rule; to govern; to administer
司る: (つかさどる) - to rule; to govern; to administer
司令塔: (shireitou) - torre de controle, torre de comando; líder, comandante, pessoa que dá as ordens; construtor de jogadas, criador de jogadas
司令官: (しれいかん) - commandant; commanding officer; general
司令長官: (しれいちょうかん) - Commander-in-Chief; C-in-C
司会: (shikai) - liderar uma reunião, presidir uma reunião, conduzir uma cerimônia, presidência; presidente, apresentador, anfitrião, moderador, mestre de cerimônias
司会者: (しかいしゃ) - chairman; moderator; toastmaster; master of ceremonies; chairperson; host (of a TV show, etc.)
司厨士: (しちゅうし) - chef (Western cuisine); cook or waiter on a ship
司厨長: (しちゅうちょう) - head steward (e.g. on a ship); palace chef
司式: (ししき) - officiating (a ceremony); presiding (over a service)
司徒: (しと) - Minister of Civil Administration and Social Welfare (Zhou-dynasty China)
司教座教会: (しきょうざきょうかい) - cathedral
司教権座: (しきょうけんざ) - the episcopal seat
司法判断: (しほうはんだん) - judicial ruling; judicial decision; judgment; judgement
司法判断適合性: (しほうはんだんてきごうせい) - justiciability
司法大臣: (しほうだいじん) - Minister of Justice
司法官: (しほうかん) - officer of the court
司法書士: (しほうしょし) - judicial scrivener; judicial clerk; person qualified to prepare legal documents, handle real-estate transactions, etc.
